nodes.excerpt: Interial enhances the frame rate of the video that you provided depending on your choosing. Interial currently allows you to do 2X or 4X enhancement which will significantly improve the frame rate of your video making it much smoother.
nodes.title: Interial - AI web app to enhance video frame rate making it smoother

nodes.title: Podpage 2.0 - Instant podcast websites to monetize and engage listeners.

nodes.excerpt: Have you ever wondered where that plastic piece you accidentally dropped ended up? Weâ€™ve developed a map that can show you just that â€“ the Plastic Tracker. Input your location and see the likelihood of it ending up in the ocean, and a possible trajectory.

nodes.excerpt: Using the latest A.I. and cloud technology, Catapult allows you to translate your texts up to 3-times faster than usual. Additionally, it keeps the same formatting and design as the original document. Works with over 60+ different file types.
nodes.title: Catapult - Translate Faster - Translate your documents up to 3-times faster
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: KOYA makes it easy to schedule personal messages with: - A memory (video or image) - URL (Spotify, YouTube, etc) - Optional gift ($$ for coffee, beer, tacos, etc)
nodes.title: KOYA - Send thoughtful, timely messages and micro-gifts
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMerÃ©

nodes.excerpt: Current Virtual DOM implementations are inadequateâ€”Ranging from overcomplicated to abandoned, most are unusable without sacrificing raw performance and size. Million aims to fix this, providing a library-agnostic Virtual DOM to serve as the core for Javascript libraries.
nodes.title: Million.js - A fast, <1kb virtual DOM
nodes.author: Aiden Bai

nodes.excerpt: Castyr is a new social podcasting and listening platform. Snip and annotate up to 5 minutes of audio, share it in the community feed, and organize it into customizable collections on your followable profile. Itâ€™s like TikTok and Goodreads had a podcast baby.
nodes.title: Castyr - Like TikTok and Goodreads had a podcast baby
nodes.author: Nick Abouzeid

nodes.excerpt: VectorIcons Mixer is a simple online tool that allows you to mix & match thousands of vector icons with colorful shapes to generate new icon sets with a few clicks. There are lots of icon styles & hundreds of abstract, geometric & organic shapes to combine!
nodes.title: VectorIcons Mixer by Iconshock - Get thousands of free icon variations using colorful shapes
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento

nodes.excerpt: Spot is a virtual office loaded with the collaboration and communication functionality a high-performing team needs: voice and video, screen-sharing, and chat all at the team's fingertips.
nodes.title: Spot - The virtual hub for your organization
nodes.author: Gordon Hempton

nodes.excerpt: LiveMart gives you scalable GraphQL based eCommerce API to connect to any website, mobile app, IoT device, POS and so on.
nodes.title: LiveMart - Headless GraphQL ecommerce API for global brands
nodes.author: Sakib Sami

nodes.excerpt: MyFocusSpace, a virtual co-working space that will change the way we work remotely. You can find an accountability buddy to work with at any time, anywhere, on-demand.
nodes.title: MyFocusSpace - Accountability on-demand for remote workers
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: Using burner pages to measure user interest is a proven method used by the world's most successful companies. We package everything entrepreneurs need to build, host and measure your pages and collect user feedback, with a few clicks and no code.
nodes.title: Burner Page - Validate ideas with burner pages in < 60 seconds
nodes.author: Avi Muchnick

nodes.excerpt: Gradient king provides a huge collection of elegant gradients. We also provide a well-efficient gradient generator where you could drag and drop your image and grab the gradients from it, Dark mode, categories, search, like, download, bookmark, and much more.
nodes.title: Gradient King - Curated collection of 125+ fresh gradients
nodes.author: Savio Martin

nodes.excerpt: Turn your notes about any particular topic to podcasts automatically. Listen to them over and over again for convenience and to retain the information better. Share your knowledge with the world with a click of a button. Check out https://www.note-bytes.com/
nodes.title: NoteBytes - Turn your notes into podcasts and share them with the world
nodes.author: Irtiza Hafiz
